author: scottbw
msg: Deprecated our custom HtmlSerializer implementation and replaced with the default SimpleHtmlSerializer from HtmlCleaner; this does the same job when configured with the allowHtmlInsideAttributes property set. Also replaced "getChildren" with "getChildTagNodes" as in future versions of HtmlCleaner this method is not guaranteed to always return only TagNode objects.
